org.jdrupes

Class AbstractComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.internal.ComponentNode
      • org.jdrupes.AbstractComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Component>, Channel, Component, Matchable, Manager

    public class AbstractComponent
extends ComponentNode
implements Component, Channel
    A convenience base class for new components. In general, components can be created by deriving from this class or by implementing the interface Component.

    By deriving from this class, a component implementation gets direct access to the methods of the Manager interface and doesn't have to access the manager using a manager attribute.

    See Also:
    Component
